items.label: setLastModified()
items.documentation: Sets the current time as the `last-modified` header.

items.label: setTextPayload(string payload, string contentType = text/plain)
items.documentation: Sets a `string` as the payload.

items.label: getHeaderNames()(string[])
items.documentation: Gets all the names of the headers of the response.

items.label: setEntity(mime:Entity e)
items.documentation: Sets the provided `Entity` to the response.

items.label: setXmlPayload(xml payload, string contentType = application/xml)
items.documentation: Sets an `xml` as the payload

items.label: setBinaryPayload(byte[] payload, string contentType = application/octet-stream)
items.documentation: Sets a `byte[]` as the payload.

items.label: getHeaders(string headerName)(string[])
items.documentation: Gets all the header values to which the specified header key maps to.

items.label: getBinaryPayload()(byte[]|error)
items.documentation: Gets the response payload as a `byte[]`.

items.label: getPayloadAsString()(string|error)
items.documentation:
Gets the response payload as a `string`. Content type is not checked during payload construction which
makes this different from `getTextPayload()` function.

items.label: setByteChannel(io:ReadableByteChannel payload, string contentType = application/octet-stream)
items.documentation: Sets a `ByteChannel` as the payload.

items.label: createNewEntity()(ballerina/mime:Entity)
items.documentation: Create a new `Entity` and link it with the response.

items.label: setJsonPayload(json payload, string contentType = application/json)
items.documentation: Sets a `json` as the payload.

items.label: getXmlPayload()(xml|error)
items.documentation: Extracts `xml` payload from the response. If the the content type is not XML, an `error` is returned.

items.label: hasHeader(string headerName)(boolean)
items.documentation: Checks whether the requested header key exists in the header map.

items.label: addHeader(string headerName, string headerValue)
items.documentation: Adds the specified header to the response. Existing header values are not replaced.

items.label: getByteChannel()(ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|error)
items.documentation:
Gets the response payload as a `ByteChannel`, except in the case of multiparts. To retrieve multiparts, use
`getBodyParts()`.

items.label: getEntity()(ballerina/mime:Entity|error)
items.documentation: Gets the `Entity` associated with the response.

items.label: removeAllHeaders()
items.documentation: Removes all the headers from the response.

items.label: setPayload(string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[] payload)
items.documentation: Sets the response payload.

items.label: setETag(json|xml|string|byte[] payload)
items.documentation: Sets the `etag` header for the given payload. The ETag is generated using a CRC32 hash function.

items.label: getContentType()(string)
items.documentation: Gets the type of the payload of the response (i.e: the `content-type` header value).

items.label: getBodyParts()(ballerina/mime:Entity[]|error)
items.documentation: Extracts body parts from the response. If the content type is not a composite media type, an error is returned.

items.label: setBodyParts(mime:Entity[] bodyParts, string contentType = multipart/form-data)
items.documentation: Set multiparts as the payload.

items.label: getJsonPayload()(json|error)
items.documentation: Extract `json` payload from the response. If the content type is not JSON, an `error` is returned.

items.label: setHeader(string headerName, string headerValue)
items.documentation:
Sets the specified header to the response. If a mapping already exists for the specified header key, the
existing header value is replaced with the specfied header value.

items.label: setContentType(string contentType)
items.documentation: Sets the `content-type` header to the response.

items.label: getHeader(string headerName)(string)
items.documentation:
Returns the value of the specified header. If the specified header key maps to multiple values, the first of
these values is returned.

items.label: setFileAsPayload(string filePath, string contentType = application/octet-stream)
items.documentation: Sets the content of the specified file as the entity body of the response.

items.label: removeHeader(string key)
items.documentation: Removes the specified header from the response.

items.label: getTextPayload()(string|error)
items.documentation: Extracts `text` payload from the response. If the content type is not of type text, an `error` is returned.
